## MySQLConnectionOptions.timezone property

MySQL server's timezone.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
timezone?: string;
```

## Remarks

MySQL stores datetime values without timezone information. The value of this option is used to interpret the timezone of the values stored in the database and serialize/deserialize `Date` instances.

Can be "local" (same as the application timezone), "Z" (UTC) or offset in the form "+HH:MM" or "-HH:MM".
